metadata.name: Automatically destroy poops and fires (and sometimes rocks and walls)
metadata.description:
Automatically destroy fires and poops in rooms with no enemies. It saves a lot of time as you don't need to "farm" poops and fires anymore, but keep in mind that it does make it much easier to reach the boss rush and Hush!
You can configure which fire and poop types are destroyed by using Mod Config Menu Pure https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787. By default, only normal fires, normal poops and golden poops are destroyed.
In the configuration menu, you can also enable the destruction of rocks and secret room walls. They will only be destroyed if you could destroy them without spending a bomb: if have a golden bomb, or if you are stompy, or if you have a passive item that would allow you to destroy them (i.e. all items that turn your tears into bombs and a few others).
Destroyed poops and rocks will automatically fill holes all around them.
